CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Verify that for a fileSystem UISourceCode with persistence binding TabbedEditorContainer opens filesystem UISourceCode.

Binding created: {
       network: http://127.0.0.1:8000/devtools/persistence/resources/foo.js
    fileSystem: file:///var/www/devtools/persistence/resources/foo.js
}
Opened tabs before opening any UISourceCodes:
request open uiSourceCode: file:///var/www/devtools/persistence/resources/foo.js
Opened tabs after opening UISourceCode:
    file:///var/www/devtools/persistence/resources/foo.js
